document.full_text: the south carolina supreme court ruled monday night that a move by republican governor nikki haley to force legislators back to work was an "unconstitutional violation of separation of powers."
document.title: s.c. court blocks governor's back-to-work order
lines_and_colors: the south carolina supreme court ruled monday night that a move by republican governor nikki haley to force legislators back to work was an "unconstitutional violation of separation of powers."
